rooms.name: Long Lake Town
rooms.description:
You are at the Long Lake Town, the starting point of your adventure. You might want to take a sword with you to defend the danger. 
Lately a dragon from the west are harassing the town. You, the warrior, suggested to go slay the dragon. Good luck on your adventure!

rooms.name: Forest of Mist
rooms.description: You are in the Forest of Mist. You explored this place. Found nothing but a crystal bottle with some unknown potion inside.

rooms.name: Gate of Morets
rooms.description: You are in the Gate of Morets. This is one of the battlefields of an ancient war. Look carefully for things you can bring in your adventure!

rooms.name: Mine of the Dwarfs
rooms.description: You are in the Mine of the Dwarfs. Countless of treasures were dug out by the hardworking dwarfs! Look for something you can use for the adventure!

rooms.name: Deeper mines
rooms.description: You are in the Deeper mines of the Dwarfs. Danger! Danger!

rooms.name: Hall of Morets
rooms.description: You are in the Hall of Morets. Right in the middle hung a silver helmet. You heard from ancient tales that dwarfs' helmet brings you bravery.

rooms.name: Ravendell
rooms.description: You are in Ravendell, a place where elves live. The place is magical and bring you wisdom.

rooms.name: The Waterfall
rooms.description: You are at the waterfall. This is the edge of the world. It seems you cannot go any farther.

rooms.name: Storage Room
rooms.description: You are at the storage room of the mine. There are countless treasures in the room. Find the ones you need the most for your adventure.

rooms.name: Nest of the Dragon
rooms.description: You are at the Nest of the Dragon. It has been abandoned for a while. You can take whatever you want from here now.
